properties.entry: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(size), 0) FROM FileRef fr, Section se, Submission su WHERE se.id = fr.sectionId AND su.id = se.submission_id AND su.version > 0) + (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(size), 0) FROM FileRef fr, Section root, Submission su WHERE root.submission_id IS NULL AND root.id = fr.sectionId AND su.rootSection_id = root.id AND su.version > 0) + (SELECT sum(size) FROM ReferencedFile rf, FileList fl, Section se, Submission su WHERE se.fileListId = fl.id AND se.fileListId = rf.fileListId AND su.id = se.submission_id AND su.version > 0) AS submissionsTotalFileSize
